protocol.name: P-MTAB-21439
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings were exposed to high R/FR light and then to low R/FR light for a short and a long period of time. Light outputs in high R/FR were: 670 nm (Red) 96 mmoles m-2s-1; 735 nm (Far Red,) 21 mmoles m-2s-1; 470 nm (Blue) 15 mmoles m-2s-1. Light outputs in low R/FR were: 670 nm, 12 mmoles m-2s-1; 735 nm, 105 mmoles m-2s-1; 470 nm, 15 mmoles m-2s-1. 8-day-old seedlings were harvested after the exposure to low R/FR light for 4 hours and 1 day. As a control, 8-day-old seedlings grown for the entire period in high R/FR light were harvested.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-21440
text: 15 µg of cRNA was used in a 300 µl hybridization containing added hybridization controls. 200 µl of mixture was hybridized on arrays for 16 h at 45°C. Standard post hybridization wash and double-stain protocols (EukGE-WS2v4) were used on an Affymetrix GeneChip Fluidics Station 400.

(Parameters: Chamber type = Affymetrix- GeneChip Hyb Oven 640, Quantity of label target used = 15, Mass unit = Micro gram, time = 16, Tiny time unit = hours, Volume = 200, Volume unit = Micro litre, temperature = 45)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-21441
text: RNAs from two biological replicates were used to prepare hybridization probes according to Affymetrix one-cycle protocol. 5 µg of total RNA was used in a reverse transcription reaction (SuperScript II; Invitrogen, Paisley, UK) to generate first-strand cDNA. After second-strand synthesis, double-strand cDNA was used in an in vitro transcription (IVT) reaction to generate biotinylated cRNA (ENZO BioArray HighYield RNA Transcript Labeling Kit; ENZO Diagnostics, Farmingdale, NY). Size distribution of the cRNA and fragmented cRNA, respectively, was assessed using an Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer with a RNA 6000 Nano Assay.
(Parameters: Amount of nucleic acid labeled = 5, Label used = biotin, Amplification = none, Mass unit = Micro gram)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-21442
text: Seedlings were grown in a growth chamber (E30-LED, Percival Scientific Inc., USA), at 21°C temperature, 75% humidity, 16 h light/8 h dark cycles.
(Parameters: start time = 8, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-21443
text: Total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, Germany). Each sample consists of a pool of 200 individuals. Two sets of samples were collected from independent experiments.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-21444
text: Standard Affymetrix GeneChip array scan on an Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000.
(Parameters: Scanning hardware = GeneChip Scanner 3000 [Affymetrix], Scanning software = Scanning software)
